title: Proposal for Pupper T-Shirts :)
body:
Hey guys! My name is Payson I am a 21 year old college student. I have a proposal that I was wondering if people would be interested in. Basically I'm tired of working for $12/hour so I'm trying to find a way to make internet money while I finish college. I have a family friend who owns a custom t-shirt/clothing place and he agreed to give me good deals on shirts if I can bring him business. 


My proposal is if I made some dope Pupper t-shirts would people be interested in buying them? My roommate does graphic design so we can get them looking great, we could go for a clean looking shirt or a meme-y looking shirt or whatever you guys decide! I think it would be a good way to shill and that people would definitely ask if they saw you wearing a "Pupper to the moon!" shirt 


We could agree ahead of time to do something with a % of the profits. 

This could go towards:

-Marketing (Maybe save up for a web advertisement?)
-Charity (Community voted charity)
-The developers (My interactions with these guys have been great so that'd be a nice gift back to them for their hard work!)
-The community (Maybe each month the profits can go to the 'MVP' of the month. Someone who's been helpful in the telegram who we would want to ~toss a bone~ lol) 

I would obviously do all of the work with shipping the shirts and selling them. I will also be very transparent with the community and show invoices of how much I am buying the shirt for and how much we're selling so there is no concern there.

Please vote honestly and if you have any comments or questions or concerns feel free to reach out to me on telegram @paysonallen



PUPPER TO THE MOON!
author: 0xb3E84ffB74974A6711e29108d447683b0F5e63eC
